The [Bernoulli Center for Fundamental Studies](https://bernoulli.epfl.ch/) is located on the campus of the [École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne](https://www.epfl.ch/en/) in Switzerland, canton of Vaud.

See the Google Maps link below, or check out [how to reach the EPFL Lausanne campus](https://www.epfl.ch/campus/visitors/coming-to-epfl/#Lausanne) and [how to reach the Bernoulli Center](https://bernoulli.epfl.ch/planning-your-visit/) in particular.

Closest train stations are Lausanne and Renens.
These are linked by a subway that passes close to the venue (m1, UNIL-Sorge).
Closest airport is GVA (Geneva), less than an hour from Lausanne by train.
Zurich (ZRH) is a couple of hours away by train.
